items.title: The Most Read Books on Goodreads in July 2025
items.description: Here are the five most-read books on Goodreads this week! These are the buzziest books of the moment, from dystopia to romance.

items.title: The Best New Books of August, According to Indie Booksellers
items.description: What better way to get book recommendations than from independent booksellers? Here are ten of their favorites of August 2025.

items.title: What are You Reading in August?
items.description: What did you read in July? What's on your TBR for August? And which 2025 Read Harder Challenge tasks did you complete? Let's chat!

items.title: August Horror Books to Keep the Scares Going for the Rest of Summer
items.description: Make your final beach reading days more spooky with these new horror books, from queer historical horror to a folk horror/thriller mix.

items.title: Writers Need Libraries: How Libraries Can Help You Write Better
items.description: From research to work spaces to community building, libraries are an essential part of improving your writing life.
